data.title: Introducing WCHS-TV8 Online
data.meta_description: WCHS-TV8 has developed this World Wide Website to provide our viewers with a more interactive, informative television experience. We believe the exciting world of the Internet gives broadcasters a remarkable new vehicle - and a competitive advantage - for informing and entertaining the public as we move through the 21st Century.
data.text:
WCHS-TV8 has developed this World Wide Website to provide our viewers with a more interactive, informative television experience. We believe the exciting world of the Internet gives broadcasters a remarkable new vehicle - and a competitive advantage - for informing and entertaining the public as we move through the 21st Century. The personalities and features that members of our communities have loved over the years are now available online, putting a familiar face on a new and innovative medium. Community members looking for the most complete source of news, weather, sports and entertainment will continue to discover that WCHS-TV8 Online is their first and best stop on the World Wide Web. Our site is yet another example of WCHS-TV8's continued commitment to meet the information and entertainment needs of our viewers.

To advertise online contact Dan Carney by email at or by phone at 304-346-5358.

WCHS-TV is part of ., one of the largest and most diversified television broadcasting companies in the country today. Sinclair owns and operates, programs or provides sales services to 74 television stations in 45 markets. Sinclair's television group reaches approximately 26.3% of US television households and includes FOX, ABC, MyTV, CW, CBS, NBC, MTN and Azteca affiliates. Sinclair, either directly or through its Ventures subsidiary, makes equity investments in strategic companies. Sinclair Broadcast Group, Inc. was founded in 1986, went public in 1995 and is traded on the Nasdaq Exchange under the ticker symbol SBGI.
